Description: Sherd of East Greek pottery pyxis lid; irregular scar left by lost knob; ridge on top and flange at edge. Inside reserved; blobs on edge of flange, single band on top; tongues around knob, frieze of dot-rosettes and tongues outside them; diagonal strokes on moulding; maeander frieze at outside.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.566)
